terms-service-modal.text-privacyPolicy-modal-intro: This Privacy Policy explains how we handle your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection          Regulation (GDPR) and the German Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG).
terms-service-modal.text-privacyPolicy-data-collection-desc: We collect and process personal data solely for providing our services and in accordance with applicable law.
terms-service-modal.text-privacyPolicy-no-cookies-desc: Our website does not use cookies to track your browsing behavior.
terms-service-modal.text-privacyPolicy-your-rights-desc: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. For any inquiries or to exercise your          rights, please contact us.
terms-service-modal.text-privacyPolicy-changes-desc: We may update this policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

contact-approval-modal.text-contact-approval-desc: Thank you for reaching out! Your message haas been received, and          we          will get back to you shortly.
